author: Christian Eaton
comment: Newer Android devices don't have a "menu" button, so I'm trapped in the opening help screen with no way out!

reply.author: Thomas Härtel
reply.content: You need to have an android wear watch to use the regatta timer. It's not designed to work an a smartphone or tablet. On a smartphone/tablet there will only be a help screen. I hope it helps you.

title: Can't get to clock mode!

author: Roger Kennett
comment: Doesn't work on Samsung Gear 3 either.
title: Samsung Gear 3

author: Edward Johnson
comment: Terrible.. doesn't get past first screen
